entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
